This page is about how to dump a dex

= Introduction =

In my way , it's a dex file dump into a txt file


= Details =
*1 Download the dexdump.exe from http://dex-decomplier.googlecode.com/files/dexdump.rar
or you  can found this tool in SDK 1.1 r1 
*2 deccompress classes.dex from the apk file , use winzip or winrar
*3 run "dexdump.exe -d classes.dex > dump.txt"
*4 now , you got a dump file "dump.txt"
